name: The Archivist: VR
summary: The Archivist: VR takes you into the unpredictable dreamscape of Twin Peaks. Leaving the borders of reality behind, you will enter the meticulously recreated world in virtual reality and experience an unprecedented level of immersion as you re-live some of the show’s most iconic moments. With an original story line, set against the supernatural mythos of television's most mysterious town, 'The Archivist: VR' will bring you closer to the show than ever before.
